title: Close Her Eyes
description: Inspector Thanet is on the case of Charity Pritchard, a young girl who has been missing for some time now. But his concern deepens when her family, religious fundamentalists, leaves the matter in God's hands. Thanet doesn't pay much heed to first impressions, but it will be a good while after he finds Charity's poor broken body before he realizes just how wrong his preconceptions can be...
author: Dorothy Simpson
